      • isVisibleIfFolded

        boolean isVisibleIfFolded()
        If true, there will be a visual indication that this highlighter is present inside a collapsed fold region. By default it won't happen, use setVisibleIfFolded(boolean) to change it.
        See Also:
        FoldRegion.setInnerHighlightersMuted(boolean)
